This is the `r rmarkdown::metadata$title`. There are a total of `r nrow(df)` research institutions in Kerala. Of these, `r ntype[1]` are `r level_ntpe[1]` government owned and `r ntype[2]` `r if_else( ntype[2]<2,"is","are")` `r level_ntpe[2]` owned. Major sectors of research of these institutions are `r glue::glue_collapse(x = sectors, ", ", last = " and ")`.
